dn32:1.3: gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ obhāsetvā → gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā (bj, s1-3, pts1), mahārājā → mahārājāno (mr)
dn32:3.2: ca → cakāro bj, s1-3, pts1 potthakesu
dn32:3.6: ca → cakāro bj, s1-3, pts1 potthakesu
dn32:3.12: ca → cakāro bj, s1-3, pts1 potthakesu
dn32:3.16: dhammaṃ desesi → dhammamadesesi (bj, s1-3, pts1) | dhammaṃ deseti (?)
dn32:7.17: Itthiṃ vā vāhanaṃ → itthī-vāhanaṃ (bj, pts1) | itthiṃ vāhanaṃ (s1-3)
dn32:10.14: supparodho ca → suppagedho ca (bj, s1-3, pts1)
